alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson; Robertson; Rutherford; Sumner; Trousdale; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Davidson, north central Rutherford, southern Sumner, Wilson, northeastern Cheatham, western Trousdale and southern Robertson Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1214 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Gallatin to near White House to near Coopertown. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Lebanon, Springfield, Ashland City, Nashville, Madison, Hendersonville, La Vergne, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, Coopertown, Belle Meade, Lakewood, Ridgetop and Watertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Cheatham; Davidson; Robertson; Rutherford; Sumner; Trousdale; Wilson
